Name: Essence Channeler
Story Background: Born with a rare connection to the elemental forces of nature, the Essence Channelers are revered among their tribe for their ability to harness the raw power of the world itself.
Ability: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may add G to your mana pool.
Appearance Description: The Essence Channeler is a tall figure draped in flowing robes made of leaves and vines. Their eyes glow with an otherworldly light, and small motes of energy dance around their outstretched hand.
